bnd_width: fill in  bounding box size for key component
training_data_number: fill in number of training data

translation.note: set the range of translation in Blender

rotation.note: set the range of rotation in Blender

python_bin: Create an virtual env of python 3.9 and set the env path here
yolo_image_path: Set your yolo training image path
yolo_xml_path: Set your yolo xml annotation path
yolo_txt_path: Set your yolo txt annotation path
